div.p: Shown are the zonal mean temperatures for 5 degree bands from 25–75N (colors—same conventions as in Fig. 2a) and the extratropical 2–75N mean series (black) for ( a) GISTEMP, ( b) HadCRUT4, and ( c) Cowtan & Way instrumental temperature series. Shown are the corresponding QRA fingerprint series ( d– f) along with linear trend from 1970–2015 (black dashed).
